autoDetectDescription: The following  devices were detected. They need to be configured to be used by ioBroker. Click add button to transfer values into the table. Then add name & pin and save.
errorDeviceDuplicate: Error, two devices have the same MAC. Please remove the duplicates.
errorDeviceWithoutPin: At least one device has no PIN configured. Without PIN no control is possible. Please either enter PIN or delete incomplete device.
errorIdentify: Could not contact device. Either try again later or add device manually with other button.
interval: Polling interval[ms] (ignored if per device interval is set)
name: Name
